name: folder-drop-manager
description: Easy API for Desktop Folder Drag&Drop to the browser

scripts.copy: mkdir build; cp dist-umd/src/index.js build/folder-drop-manager-umd.js && cp dist/src/index.js build/folder-drop-manager.js && cp dist-mjs/src/index.js build/folder-drop-manager-mjs.js && mkdir docs && cp build/* docs && cp examples/* docs && cp dist/src/index.d.ts build/folder-drop-manager.d.ts && rm -rf dist*
scripts.all: rm -rf dist dist-umd dist-mjs build docs build && npm run build && npm run minify && npm run copy

author: Sebastian Gurin
